name: SuperStar TEENAGE GIRLS
description:
SuperStar meets Teenage Girls, girl group audition project for a global heartbeat rush!
Begin your rhythm game journey with SuperStar Teenage Girls

New Song Updates & New Theme Cards
- Each update delivers a new song update!

Global Competitions from World Record & Weekly League
- Who is the best player of this track?! Go for your World Record spot!
- 20-player online competition in Weekly League! Win and promote to a higher league!

Exclusive Contents & Various Events
- Only available here! Exclusive contents as gifts for you!
- Join various events for many rewards!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Application Permission Usage Notice]
We are requesting for access permissions to provide services as below.
Required Access Permissions
Camera/Storage: For saving the game data in your storage
Read, write on external storage: For saving settings and music data cache
Device ID and phone calls: For tracking and analyzing advertisement records and creating tokens for push notifications
Wi-Fi connection information: For sending guide messages upon downloading additional data
ID: For creating and confirming user accounts


[Access Permission Revoke]
Settings > SuperStar TEENAGE GIRLS > Access Agree or Access Revoke

※ Visual Setting
If you experience lags in the game you can change your visual setting to low resolution for better performance.

※ While SuperStar TEENAGE GIRLS is available for free, you will get charged upon purchases of certain paid items.

※ If you have any inquiries or require any further information, please contact us at.
E-MAIL: support.superstar.teenagegirls@dalcomsoft.com
